column1: MYTH: @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's #OperationWarpSpeed COVID-19 vaccine has been rushed and will be unsafe.  FACT: FDA approval means this vaccine will have met the same safety requirements as other drugs.  My friends in the Doctors Caucus explain more here ⬇️ https://t.co/PopWVFjdvG
I call on all western Pennsylvanians to join me in prayer for @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS as they battle COVID-19. They are tough and will bounce back stronger than ever!

Great @PittsburghPG editorial on Gov. Wolf’s coronavirus orders being declared unconstitutional.  The Constitution is not a suggestion. Emergencies do not grant politicians unlimited authority to restrict rights even if the policies are well-intentioned.  https://t.co/tiHioh8F0F

As someone who has donated plasma it's an easy way to make a big difference for someone in need. If you've recovered from COVID-19 consult your doctor about where you can donate and help save lives! https://t.co/vZywDH6Ai4
If you’ve had COVID-19 donating plasma can save lives. Talk with your doctor about how you can help. https://t.co/2eGIkI98KE

When we support small businesses like local music venues we’re supporting our communities. The #RESTART Act will build on the success of #PPP by helping companies survive and workers thrive during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Doctors and nurses need our support as they risk their own health to treat #COVID19 patients. I introduced the Essential Workforce Parity Act to extend paid medical leave to America's health care heroes if they get sick while caring for others. https://t.co/KiuC7tmZbg

Opportunity zones are helping revitalize western PA & they will help us through the economic devastation caused by coronavirus. Last month @RepRonKind & I urged @IRSNews to extend deadlines for OZ investment & I am thankful that @POTUS delivered!  https://t.co/ajb9HoJA5W

Some encouraging news for U.S. workers. The coronavirus wreaked havoc on the economy but we are already bouncing back.  Before this pandemic Americans had built the best economy in half a century and we will do it again!  https://t.co/TGlWQIkNrp
Thanks to the hosts of @theview for having me on today to discuss my battle with #COVID19 and the importance of getting America back to work! https://t.co/MawmscX7tt

I will be on ABC's @TheView this morning at approximately 11:15 a.m. to discuss my experience with #COVID19 and the next steps our nation will take as we look to safely re-open the economy. Be sure to tune in!

So far the response to #COVID19 has been largely bipartisan but now Speaker Pelosi has decided that political posturing is more important than getting Americans through the economic devastation this pandemic has caused. I voted 'NO' on her bill tonight.  https://t.co/ZeIPljinMv

We are excited to welcome @POTUS @realDonaldTrump to the Commonwealth today & thankful for his support during the COVID-19 pandemic. PA has received:  ✅$300+ million for testing ✅$21.4 billion in SBA loans ✅2.6 million N-95 masks  ..and so much more from this administration.

“I just thought for me to give up a couple hours of my life to go and donate....what an easy way to maybe be part of a cure that the world is searching for right now.”  I spoke w/ @rollcall about my plasma donation to help those fighting #COVID19.   https://t.co/eQjaaK14mv

It’s been said that 90% of life is showing up because when you show up people know that you care. Thank you @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for making PA a priority. We have received millions for #COVID19 testing in our state critical PPE & other supplies. These actions saved lives!

The response to #COVID19 has been largely bipartisan until now but the Democrats' new $3 trillion bill is a progressive wish list that puts politics over people. They should work w/ Republicans & @POTUS not abuse the crisis to ram through their radical change America agenda.

I have been declared free of #COVID19 by doctors after testing negative for the virus & positive for antibodies last week. Thank you to everyone who prayed & sent well wishes for my recovery!  https://t.co/eAy1zbOu65

Happy #NationalNursesDay to all nurses. We are grateful for all that you are doing to help those struggling with COVID-19 and all you did before this pandemic and will do after it passes. Thanks for selflessly serving our families friends and neighbors!

Western PA's @NexTier bank has loaned $97 million in #PaycheckProtectionProgram funds to local businesses during the COVID-19 pandemic.  Today CEO Clem Rosenberger joined @TeamCavuto & talked about how #PPP has saved jobs in our communities.  https://t.co/d5fiI1baIM
Erie Pennsylvania residents seeking to be tested for COVID-19 will soon have another option available to them. ⬇️ https://t.co/fUwmun2nis

Medical providers need financial help as they fight COVID-19. Medicare advance payments are an option but their 10.25% interest rate is too high. My colleagues and I asked @CMSGov to lower these rates to expand access to this program. ⬇️  https://t.co/GH2hhu4wh0

Congress must pass a clean bill to increase funding for the Paycheck Program Program so businesses can continue paying employees and get through the COVID-19 pandemic.  @SpeakerPelosi and @SenSchumer: please put people over politics and help us get this done. https://t.co/nI7YGxE0xr

Western PA doctors & nurses are on our front line against the coronavirus and they are working around the clock. Thank you to @POTUS and @HHSGov for recognizing the needs of our health care heroes & supplying them grant funding to keep up the fight.  https://t.co/Fxt4dtbk9Y

#SmallBiz owners: the Paycheck Protection Program is up & running.  A #PPPloan through SBA is federally guaranteed if used to cover payroll & other business expenses during the coronavirus pandemic. More info available from @SBAgov ⬇️  https://t.co/4LTcyUsrqB

Today I received word that I tested positive for COVID-19. My symptoms are mild and I will continue serving Pennsylvania's 16th District from home until I fully recover.  Read my full statement here: ⬇️  https://t.co/63g1zGHK9L

The Senate CARES bill helps workers during the coronavirus pandemic by temporarily increasing unemployment benefits & expanding access to the self-employed & independent contractors.  Check out the @WaysandMeansGOP's analysis for more info. ⬇️  https://t.co/VvHlL1fJJa

Rahm Emanuel once said “never allow a crisis to go to waste.”  Chuck Schumer & Nancy Pelosi are following that advice as they obstruct relief for workers & businesses hurt by coronavirus shutdowns. Why? To ram through a series of progressive pet projects!  https://t.co/QkWpWAIbr1

At 2:00 p.m. @GovernorTomWolf & Secretary of Health Dr. Rachel Levine will update Pennsylvanians on efforts to combat the coronavirus.  WHAT: Update on COVID-19 via Virtual Press Conference WHEN: Today 2:00 PM WHERE: Live Stream ⬇️  https://t.co/q5q3q69sci

Want to know how Congress and @POTUS  @realDonaldTrump are fighting the #coronavirus and supporting Americans during this public health emergency?  Check out the detailed summary by @WaysandMeansGOP at the link below. ⬇️  https://t.co/jocxWaKQNL

This week I urged @USTreasury & @IRSNews to delay the 2020 tax filing deadline beyond April 15 as we confront #coronavirus.  The agency has done so in prior emergencies most recently to bring relief to victims of hurricanes Harvey & Irma.  #InItTogether  https://t.co/Hm7RDXj4Ob

Great news for America's seniors! @POTUS @realDonaldTrump is expanding access to telehealth services through Medicare.  This will allow seniors to receive safer care as we combat #coronavirus. https://t.co/T20fGMvasL
We all have a part to play to slow the spread of #coronavirus. Young and healthy people have a crucial role in getting us through this public health emergency. https://t.co/jba898KQfs

Together we can slow the spread of coronavirus ease the burden on our most vulnerable populations and prevent our healthcare system from being overwhelmed by new cases.  Check out @POTUS @realDonaldTrump’s coronavirus guidelines for America. https://t.co/oPTtcYhL3Q
Thank you @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and @VP for bringing the goverernment and private industry together to fight the #coronavirus.   Americans will defeat this threat. https://t.co/wqf9S2mUni

We will defeat the #coronavirus.  Most who contract this disease will have mild symptoms but together we can slow the spread to the elderly & those with underlying medical conditions who are at particular risk.  For key info please visit my website. ⬇️  https://t.co/JpBcCAGHpj
Right now ➡️ @WaysandMeansGOP receiving #COVID19 briefing from @SecAzar at the #Coronavirus Command Center at @HHSGov. https://t.co/BTLehznYTL
Important information for Pennsylvanians receiving diagnostic testing for coronavirus. https://t.co/u4BPrpuG94

America is the most prepared nation on earth to confront #coronavirus and the threat to the general public remains low. Congress must act to keep it that way.  Democrats should stop playing politics with funding that will help state & local governments keep our communities safe. https://t.co/zLQcyyfPJS
Steps to prevent the spread of #coronavirus are similar to those we take to avoid colds the flu and other illnesses. https://t.co/J7dBtqOuJD https://t.co/MaCHp2xhpp
The @CDCgov website is a one stop shop for information and updates regarding the coronavirus. https://t.co/7k58S4Sq95
